import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { response } from 'express'; import { CustomerService } from '../customer.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-view-products', templateUrl: './view-products.component.html', styleUrls: ['./view-products.component.css'] }) export class ViewProductsComponent { products:any constructor(private customerService:CustomerService) { } ngOnInit() { this.customerService.ViewProducts() .subscribe(response => { this.products = response; console.log(response); }); } }
